name: UIFontDescriptor.TraitKey
desc: Keys for retrieving the font descriptor's trait information.

items.name: static let slant: UIFontDescriptor.TraitKey
items.desc: The relative slant angle of the font.

items.name: static let weight: UIFontDescriptor.TraitKey
items.desc: The numerical value that corresponds to a font face.

items.name: static let width: UIFontDescriptor.TraitKey
items.desc: The inter-glyph spacing of the font.
